item.title: Hey SF get down to Golden Gate Park for a FREE music festival!! Hardly Strictly Bluegrass Music Festival is totally free and massive with tons of stages. You can bring in all your standard park gear and it's such a vibe esp since it's sunny out. Skip Dolo
